thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Mark Gibson
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Mark Gibson

author: Mark Gibson
title: Mark Gibson
text:
Whilst we only received responses from two of the three firms, the two who responded were very good (streets ahead of two random Quote: s I had sourced independently).
We went with one of the two from this site.
In addition, Finn was very good with follow up questions and provided checklists so we had the right tools to quiz hose submitting the Quote: s.
Will recommend this site to others (many who live interstate and may not be able to use the firm we ended up going with).
